synopsis.text: Wil and Allison, two orphans turned into unlikely heroes, embark on a daring quest to uncover a mythical treasure that holds the promise of ending a century-long war between the two divided nations of Roxche and Sou Beil. As members of the Roxche Air Force, they journey deep into enemy territory, guided by hope and the dream of a united, peaceful world. Their courage and determination inspire their daughter, Lillia, who continues their legacy, working tirelessly to bring harmony to the once-torn lands. This anime invites viewers to join Wil and Allison on their epic adventure, fostering a belief in a world where unity triumphs over division and love conquers hatred.
